channel.title: F5 NGINX ModSecurity WAF on DEV -- docs-nginx-com
channel.description: Recent content in F5 NGINX ModSecurity WAF on DEV -- docs-nginx-com

item.title: Technical Specifications
item.description:
Important

F5 NGINX ModSecurity WAF reached End of Sale (EoS) effective April 1, 2022. No further renewals will be accepted as of April 1, 2023.

NGINX ModSecurity WAF reaches End of Life (EoL) effective March 31, 2024.

For additional information, refer to the End of Life Announcement on the NGINX Blog. If you would like to contact your account manager at any time, please reach out to us.

F5 NGINX ModSecurity WAF is a module for NGINX Plus.
